GitHub

Sample Images

To obtain access to a larger set of rice images (RGB, FLUO, NIR, IR), please contact PI: H. Walia

  • Publications:

    • Campbell MT, Knecht AC, Berger B, Brien CJ, Wang D, Walia H. Integrating Image-Based Phenomics and Association Analysis to Dissect the Genetic Architecture of Temporal Salinity Responses in Rice. 2015, Plant Physiology. Link.

    • Knecht AC, Campbell MT, Caprez A, Swanson DR, Walia H. Image Harvest: An open source platform for high-throughput plant image processing and analysis. 2016, JXB. (In prep).
